divs: sighting details i am a lorry driver and was on the a50 heading from derby to the m1 motorway when i noticed what i initially thought was an aircraft due east midlands airport being in the area. the object caught my attention as it was pulsating through a range of different colours, it was then that i realised it couldn't be an plane as they only use red, green and white for their beacons\strobes. also it moved very randomly at incredible speed and seemed to change direction instantly which i haven't even seen military aircraft do. it was heading away from me and then as it got a few miles from me headed back some way and then started to hover over a field approx 1\2 mile away. i felt intruigue, excitment and in a way felt i could be seeing things but i know i wasn't (if that makes sense).
Summary: Star like object near East Midlands Airport
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Derby
There were no other sightings in Derby on or around September 14th 2011
